page.title: 15FIRBECK HOSPITAL
page.content: {Firbeck Hospital}is a residential rehabilitation centre getting its patients from{S.Yorks,N.Notts}and{ {N.Derbyshire.}Of the 80 beds 6 of them are specially equipped for{bronchitic} patients and 8 patients are there to walk again after having a leg amputated.{Firbeck Hospital}has a {gymnasium}and a{treatment pool.}The gymnasium is equipped with weight and pully benches for exercises. There is also an outside games area. The treatment pool has a chlorination plant used for hydro_therapy.There is a games room which is both for theraputic and leisure activites.There are some snooker tables and a skittle alley.The patients are allowed out from 5.00pm till 10:15pm after which nobody is allowed in or out without a good reason. From 6.00pm till 8.00pm relatives may visit the patients.
